summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Appendix 3G (Update to previous announcement)  
- **Reason for Update**: Correction regarding application of ASX Listing Rule 7.2  
- **Unquoted Securities Issued**:  
  - **Class**: NECAI (Performance Rights)  
  - **Number Issued**: 606,371 (under employee incentive scheme, no KMP involvement)  
  - **Issue Date**: 16/06/2025  
  - **Terms**: [Link to scheme details](https://announcements.asx.com.au/asxpdf/20230926/pdf/05v8twpw77g6tj.pdf)  
- **Post-Issue Capital Structure**:  
  - **Ordinary Shares (NEC)**: 1,585,762,123 (quoted)  
  - **Performance Rights (NECAI)**: 8,239,150 (unquoted)  
- **Placement Capacity Used**: 606,371 securities issued under 15% placement capacity (LR 7.1).  

**No material trading or capital markets impact identified beyond routine disclosure update**.
